con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://xmlns.fedex.com/customerContact" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://xmlns.fedex.com/customerContact" xmlns:sch1="http://xmlns.fedex.com/csr/common" xmlns:sch0="http://xmlns.fedex.com/customerContact" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.fedex.com/customerContact" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:element name="contactCreateRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:serviceRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" name="contactProfile"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contact" type="tns:contactDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="relationshipProfile" type="tns:relationshipProfileDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="insertIdentifier" type="tns:string20"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:unique name="uniqueInsertId"> <xsd:selector xpath="contactProfile"/> <xsd:field xpath="insertIdentifier"/> </xsd:unique> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactCreateResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="contactResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="insertIdentifier" type="tns:string20"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactDeleteRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:serviceRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactDeleteResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="contactResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="sequenceCounter" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactInquiryRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="sourceAppId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element maxOccurs="100" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="100" name="sourceSystemKey" type="tns:string32"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element default="ORIGINAL" name="recordType" type="tns:recordTypeCd"/> <xsd:element name="resultOptions" type="tns:resultOptions"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Must provide at least 1 of the following: contactProfile, relationshipProfile.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactInquiryResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="100" minOccurs="0" name="inquiryResult" type="tns:resultDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactSearchRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="searchCriteria"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="sourceAppId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element default="ORIGINAL" name="recordType" type="tns:recordTypeCd"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactProfile"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="tns:searchNameDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="companyName"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string2_65"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="address" type="tns:searchAddressDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="telecommunication" type="tns:searchTelecommunicationDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="tns:searchEmailDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="socialMedia" type="tns:searchSocialMediaDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="alternativeIdentifiers" type="tns:searchAlternativeIdDetail"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="relationshipProfile" type="tns:searchRelationshipDetail"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="resultOptions" type="tns:resultOptions"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Must provide at least 1 of the following: contactProfile, relationshipProfile.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="paging"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="resultsPerPage" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> <xsd:attribute name="pagingToken" type="tns:string250"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactSearchResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="100" minOccurs="0" name="searchResult" type="tns:resultDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="paging"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:attribute name="resultsPerPage" type="xsd:positiveInteger"/> <xsd:attribute name="pagingToken" type="tns:string250"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactMaintenanceRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:serviceRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" name="maintenance"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="11" minOccurs="0" name="manageName" type="tns:manageNameDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entire name(s) must be passed on change, which will overlay the existing details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageCompanyName" type="tns:manageCompanyNameDetail"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="manageAddress" type="tns:manageAddressDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entire address(es) must be passed on change, which will overlay the existing details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="manageTelecommunication" type="tns:manageTelecomDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entire telecommunication device(s) must be passed on change, which will overlay the existing details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="manageEmail" type="tns:manageEmailDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entire email(s) must be passed on change, which will overlay the existing details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="manageSocialMedia" type="tns:manageSocialMediaDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entire social media account(s) must be passed on change, which will overlay the existing details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="50" minOccurs="0" name="manageAlternativeIdentifiers" type="tns:manageAlternativeIdDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entire alternative identifier(s) must be passed on change, which will overlay the existing details.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageAdditionalInfo" type="tns:manageAdditionalInfoDetail"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Contains maintenance methods for internal elements.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:unique name="uniqueContactId"> <xsd:selector xpath="tns:maintenance"/> <xsd:field xpath="tns:contactId"/> </xsd:unique> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="contactMaintenanceResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="10" minOccurs="0" name="contactResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="sequenceCounter" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="relationshipCreateRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:serviceRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element name="relationshipProfile" type="tns:relationshipProfileDetail"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="relationshipCreateResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="relationshipDeleteRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:serviceRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element name="relationshipProfile" type="tns:relationshipProfileDetail"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="relationshipDeleteResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedResponse" type="tns:detailedResponse"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="resultDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sourceAppId" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="originSourceAppId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactId" type="tns:string32"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="sequenceCounter" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="recordType" type="tns:recordTypeCd"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contact" type="tns:contactDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="relationshipProfile" type="tns:relationshipProfileDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="lastUpdateDate" type="xsd:dateTime"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchNameDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="personInfo" type="tns:searchPersonInfoDetail"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchPersonInfoDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="firstName"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string65"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="middleName"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string65"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="lastName"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string2_65"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchAddressDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="line"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string65"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="city"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string2_65"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="stateProvince" type="tns:string2_65"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="postalText"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:string15"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="country" type="tns:string2_2"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchTelecommunicationDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="5" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="tns:telecomTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>HOME, MOBILE, WORK, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="numericCountryCd" type="tns:numericString5"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>e.g "1" for US, "44" for UK</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="alphaCountryCd" type="tns:string2_2"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>e.g "US" for US, "UK" for UK</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="areaCd" type="tns:numericString5"/> <xsd:element name="number" type="tns:phoneString20"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="extension" type="tns:numericString6"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="pin" type="tns:numericString15"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchEmailDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="2" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="tns:emailTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PERSONAL, WORK, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="value"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:emailAddress"> <xsd:attribute name="search" type="tns:searchType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EQUAL, STARTSWITH, ENDSWITH, CONTAINS</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchSocialMediaDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="socialMediaPlatform" type="tns:socialMediaPlatformCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FACEBOOK, TWITTER, LINKEDIN, MYSPACE, GOOGLE, INSTAGRAM, FOURSQUARE, FXBLOG, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="value" type="tns:string256"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchAlternativeIdDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:string30"/> <xsd:element name="value" type="tns:string60"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="searchRelationshipDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="100" name="relationship"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="entityType" type="tns:entityTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ACCOUNT, PERSON, ORGANIZATION</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="entityValue" type="tns:string65"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="relationshipTypes"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="relationshipType" type="tns:string30"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of relationship that the contact has to an entity.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="opco" type="tns:opcoCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Only used if entityType = Account. Will be ignored otherwise.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageNameDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change" type="tns:nameDetail"/> <xsd:element name="delete"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:nameTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PRIMARY, PREFERRED, ALIAS, LEGAL, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="1" name="sequenceNumber" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique, numeric identifier for an existing name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageCompanyNameDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="companyName" type="tns:string2_65"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageAddressDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change" type="tns:addressDetail"/> <xsd:element name="delete"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element default="OTHER" name="type" type="tns:addressTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>HOME, WORK, SHIPPER, PAYER, RECIPIENT, BILLING, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="1" name="sequenceNumber" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique, numeric identifier for an existing address.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="OTHER" name="precedenceCd" type="tns:precedenceTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ONE, TWO, PREVIOUS, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageTelecomDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change" type="tns:telecommunicationDetail"/> <xsd:element name="delete"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:telecomTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>HOME, MOBILE, WORK, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="1" name="sequenceNumber" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique, numeric identifier for an existing telecommunication device.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="OTHER" name="precedenceCd" type="tns:precedenceTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ONE, TWO, PREVIOUS, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="deviceType" type="tns:deviceTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FX, MB, PG, VOIP, LL, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageEmailDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change" type="tns:emailDetail"/> <xsd:element name="delete"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:emailTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PERSONAL, WORK, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="1" name="sequenceNumber" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique, numeric identifier for an existing email.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="precedenceCd" type="tns:precedenceTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ONE, TWO, PREVIOUS, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageSocialMediaDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change" type="tns:socialMediaDetail"/> <xsd:element name="delete"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="platform" type="tns:socialMediaPlatformCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>FACEBOOK, TWITTER, LINKEDIN, MYSPACE, GOOGLE, INSTAGRAM, FOURSQUARE, FXBLOG, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:socialMediaTypeCd"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PERSONAL, WORK, OTHER</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element default="1" name="sequenceNumber" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unique, numeric identifier for an existing social media account.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageAlternativeIdDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change" type="tns:alternativeIdentifiersDetail"/> <xsd:element name="delete"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="type" type="tns:string30"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of an existing alternative identifier.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageAdditionalInfoDetail"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageLocale" type="tns:manageLocaleDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageGender" type="tns:manageGenderDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageTitleDetail" type="tns:manageTitleDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageBirthDate" type="tns:manageBirthDateDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageSpokenLanguage" type="tns:manageSpokenLanguageDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageWrittenLanguage" type="tns:manageWrittenLanguageDetail"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="manageOriginCountryCd" type="tns:manageOriginCountryCdDetail"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageLocaleDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="locale" type="tns:string10"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageGenderDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="gender" type="tns:genderCd"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageTitleDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="title" type="tns:string250"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageBirthDateDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="birthDate" type="xsd:date"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageSpokenLanguageDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="spokenLanguage" type="tns:string20"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageWrittenLanguageDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="writtenLanguage" type="tns:string20"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="manageOriginCountryCdDetail"> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="change"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="originCountryCd" type="tns:string2_2"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element fixed="true" name="delete" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="detailedResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="detailedComments" type="xsd:anyType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="highestSeverity" type="tns:notificationSeverityType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="150" minOccurs="0" name="notifications" type="tns:notificationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="resultOptions"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="contactProfile"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If all the information within contactProfile is wanted, do not need to pass any elements inside. Otherwise, specify each grouping of elements individually.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="notificationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="severity" type="tns:notificationSeverityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines the severity of this notification.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="code"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>A unique code value that represents this notification.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> <xsd:whiteSpace value="collapse"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="message"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Human-readable text that explains this name="serviceResponseType"> <xsd:annotation/> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="tns:rootElement"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="highestSeverity" type="tns:notificationSeverityType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="100" name="notifications" type="tns:notificationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="notificationSeverityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines the severity of a notification. All responses should contain either a SUCCESS notification or at least one ERROR or FAILURE notification. A WARNING notification can be combined with any other notification severity type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request was unsuccessful due to the content of the request. The request may be re-tried by the client.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="NOTE"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents additional information about the processing of the request that may be of interest to the caller.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents a successful request.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="WARNING"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Represents a successful request that generated a warning condition the caller should be aware of.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The request has been acknowledged and will be processed asynchronously. con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchId = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_ID") : "No Data Found" messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.project.setPropertyValue("BATCH_ID",batchId) assert batchId != null

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM MDM_STG_DATA.MDM_BATCH_AUDIT WHERE BATCH_ID in('${#Project#BATCH_ID}')

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def responseHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchStage = (responseHolder != null) ? responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_STG") : "No Data Found" def batchStatus = (responseHolder != null) ? responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_STAT") : "No Data Found" assert batchStage == 'OB' assert batchStatus == 'C'

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchId = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_ID") : "No Data Found"
messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("BATCH_ID",batchId)
assert batchId != null

con:config.con:query: SELECT MAX(BATCH_ID) AS BATCH_ID FROM MDM_STG_DATA.MDM_CONTACT_JMS_LND WHERE JMS_TMSTMP >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'DD-MON-YYYY') AND SRC_SYS IN('${#Project#1SRCAPP_ID}') ORDER BY BATCH_ID

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchId = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_ID") : "No Data Found"
messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("BATCH_ID",batchId)
assert batchId != null

con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM mdm_stg_data.mdm_batch_audit where batch_id in('${#Project#BATCH_ID}')

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def responseHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchStage = (responseHolder != null) ? responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_STG") : "No Data Found" def batchStatus = (responseHolder != null) ? responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_STAT") : "No Data Found" assert batchStage == 'OB' assert batchStatus == 'C'

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchId = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_ID") : "No Data Found" messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.project.setPropertyValue("BATCH_ID",batchId) assert batchId != null

import javax.jms.* import groovy.io.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ def responseHolder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) def entityType = responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:relationshipDetail/*:entityType") def entityValue = responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:relationshipDetail/*:entityValue") def relationshipTypes = responseHolder.getNodeValues("//*:relationshipDetail/*:relationshipType")
ArrayList<String> reqRelTypes = new ArrayList<String>() reqRelTypes.add(messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.project.getPropertyValue("TC4_RELTYPE_SM")) reqRelTypes.add(messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.project.getPropertyValue("TC4_RELTYPE_GEN")) Collections.sort(reqRelTypes)

assert entityType == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.project.getPropertyValue("ENTITY_TYPE") assert entityValue == messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.project.getPropertyValue("ENTITY_VALUE") assert reqRelTypes == resRelTypes

import javax.jms.* import groovy.io.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ def responseHolder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) def addressLines = responseHolder.getNodeValues("//*:address/*:line") def emailIDs = responseHolder.getNodeValues("//*:email/*:value") def contactId = responseHolder.getNodeValue("//*:inquiryResult/*:contactId")

con:config.con:query: SELECT MAX(BATCH_ID) AS BATCH_ID FROM mdm_stg_data.MDM_CONTACT_JMS_LND WHERE JMS_TMSTMP >= '19-MAR-2019' order by BATCH_ID

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchId = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_ID") : "No Data Found"
messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("BATCH_ID",batchId)
assert batchId != null

con:config.con:query: select BATCH_STG,BATCH_STAT from mdm_stg_data.mdm_batch_audit where batch_id in('${#Project#BATCH_ID}')

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def batchStage = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_STG") : "No Data Found" def batchStatus = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:BATCH_STAT") : "No Data Found"
messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("BATCH_STATUS",batchStatus)
assert batchStage == 'OB' assert batchStatus == 'C'

con:config.con:query: select count(*) from mdm_stg_data.MDM_CONTACT_JMS_LND where JMS_TMSTMP >= '05-MAR-2019' AND src_sys in('3530874') order by BATCH_ID
select a.party_prst_id, b.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT from c_b_party a,c_b_party_xref b where a.rowid_object=b.rowid_object and b.create_date > '01-FEB-2019' ORDER BY PARTY_PRST_ID
select * from mdm_stg_data.mdm_batch_audit_detail where src_sys_nm in('WESPT','ONESRC') and tran_ts>sysdate-1 and rej_flg='Y'

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.lang.* import com.eviware.soapui.model.testsuite.*
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def requestHolder = groovyUtils.getXmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContent ) def matchingCount = (requestHolder != null) ? requestHolder.getNodeValue("//*:Row/*:COUNTBATCH_ID") : "No Data Found"
messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("MATCHING_CONTACT_ID_COUNT",matchingCount)
